title: Large-Scale Physics Multirepresentation Ability Improvement Program Based on Remote Laboratories

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental physics concepts and educational administration experience
context.additional_context: A program for corporate training professionals to enhance competencies in operating remote laboratories.

learning_goals: Learners can convert physical experiment data into linguistic, visual, and mathematical representations.
Learners enhance their ability to autonomously design and execute experiments in a remote laboratory environment.
Learners can analyze their level of understanding through multimodal representation assessments.

resources: Two types of physics experiment devices

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
